successes.title: Amplitude
successes.description: Questions about PSN credits? Please see our BackerKit FAQ below for answers to some of your burning questions.

Pledges.description: THANKS - A hearty thank you from Harmonix and your name as a backer in the game credits!
(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)
EARLY BACKER PRICE - Get a Cross-Buy code of the full game for PlayStation®4/PlayStation®3 at launch!
Limited to the first 1,000 backers through the door! Includes getting your name in the game credits!
(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)
GET THE GAME - Get a Cross-Buy code of the full game for PlayStation®4/PlayStation®3 at launch! Includes getting your name in the game credits!
(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

Limited Edition DLC Package! FOR USERS WITH US PSN ACCOUNTS -  Get PSN codes redeemable for Harmonix DLC, including Amplitude DLC post launch (a $20 value!). Includes a Cross-Buy code of the full game for PlayStation®4/PlayStation®3 at launch and your name in the game credits! (Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----). FOR US PSN ACCOUNTS ONLY!

EARLY GAME ACCESS - Be among the first to own the game! Get a Cross-Buy code of the full game for PlayStation®4/PlayStation®3 TWO WEEKS before the regular public. Tune up your skills and get ready to top the leaderboards before the rest of the world gets their hands on the game! Includes getting your name in the game credits!
(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)
All previous tiers PLUS an EXCLUSIVE ORIGINAL PRINT created for this Kickstarter based on the art of Amplitude!
(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)
All previous reward tiers PLUS a SWEET PS2® STYLE CASE WITH NEW BOX ART. An old school case suited for display FTW!
(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)
All previous reward tiers PLUS a RAD T-SHIRT created for this Kickstarter based on the art of Amplitude!
(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

COLLECTOR'S EDITION - All previous reward tiers PLUS an EXCLUSIVE VINYL RECORD of the original soundtrack for this release. Get an amazing record with an included digital download code for the music, and killer LP sleeve! The record will only feature original music composed for this new version of the game.
(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)
